name: svelte-infinite-list
description: Implement infinite scrolling lists in Svelte applications.
readme:
# svelte-infinite-list [![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/Olyno/svelte-infinite-list?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/Olyno/svelte-infinite-list) Create an infinite list of items with optimized rendering. ## Installation ```shell npm i --save-dev svelte-infinite-list # or yarn add -D svelte-infinite-list ``` ## Usage ```svelte

{item}

 ``` ## Buy me a ko-fi Whether you use this project, have learned something from it, or just like it, please consider supporting it by buying me a coffee, so I can dedicate more time on open-source projects like this ðŸ˜‰ (personally I prefer hot chocolate but whatever) [![ko-fi](https://www.ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/olyno) ## License Code released under GNU GPLv3 license.
